Summary: Star like objects appear lighting up then dimming down and travel south
divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up to let my dogs out then laid down and noticed the sky was clear. I was looking at a star when I saw a light appear right next to the star. It came out of nowhere and started lighting up really bright not moving at all. Then it dimmed down a bit and traveled south slowly. I was going to grab my camera but it was too late. Then I am sorry I didn't because here comes another one out of the same spot. It lights up even brighter than like the one before it dims out a bit and moved south on the same course as the first one. They were both extremely high up, as high as a star. I have seen this very same thing before but the light comes out of nowhere really bright and then dims out and that would be it. I saw this twice this year but never traveling and never two one right after the next.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around April 4th 2011
